name: Blueberry Maple Caiprissimo
recipeIngredient: 2 rosemary sprigs, cut into short pieces

recipeInstructions.text: In a microwave-safe glass or mug, stir together the syrup and rosemary. Microwave on high for about 30 seconds. When cool, discard rosemary.

Add rosemary-flavored syrup to remaining ingredients in a blender. Add 1 1/2 cups ice. Purée until smooth, adding more ice if needed to achieve a consistency that is no longer liquid, but still pours freely.
